#summary Release notes

Release Notes for My Tracks version 1.1.14
  * Add a search menu option to search for tracks and waypoint
  * Display date and time using the phone's format
  * Add ISO 8601 date format as an option for the default track name in
    Settings->Recording->Track name
  * Improve the file name formatting when saving a track to the SD card
  * Improve the code for sending a track to Google Maps, Google Fusion Tables, and Google Docs
  * Improve code for sharing a Map or Fusion Table url with friends
  * Improve the code to choose an account
  * Improve the code to choose a Google Map
  * improve "About My Tracks" layout
